dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, two adventurers embark on a journey to discover its remnants.

dialogues.speaker: Eira the Brave
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of an ancient spellbook hidden deep within these ruins. If we can find it, we might be able to restore magic to our world.

dialogues.speaker: Arin the Wise
dialogues.text: Be cautious, Eira. We don't know what dangers lie ahead, and we're not sure if this spellbook even exists.
